channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 11:15 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in Myrivsk territorial community. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 11:15 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in Myrivsk territorial community. Stay tuned for further messages. #Myrivsk_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 09:59 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for the evacuation of the civilian population - 0800339291
